column4: Hi, yes erm - I'm having withdrawl symptons from the lack of Edgy Eft .. I'm wondering what command I can use to help me recover from the lack of Edgy Eft?
please take idle comments out of the main support channel, thankyou
a. dont repeat the question so quickly, b. put this into a terminal: xmodmap -e "keycode 22 = BackSpace"
sorry, it said the message couldn't be sent or something like that before so
